Class MailListControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MailListControl
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements MailStorageListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
    A list to display a list of mails.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
